posts.desc: Front-end web development is the development of the graphical user interface of a website, through the use of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

posts.description: To work as a data scientist, you must have an undergraduate or a postgraduate degree in a relevant discipline, such as Business information systems, Computer science, Economics, Information Management, Mathematics and Statistics.
Blockchain software developers build applications onto existing blockchain platforms. They handle front-end and back-end development, design, and maintenance.
